title: Securities Collateral Transfer Response
description: Provides details on the securities collateral proposal.

collateralIdentification.description: Collateral identification as known by party. Its identification is generated by the requesting party

quantity.description: Quantity requested to the distribution with command.

statusCode.description: Provides a proprietary status of each processing requested
statusCode.comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalCollateralStatusCode

rejectionInformation.description: Additional information regarding why the collateral proposal has a rejected status.
